explains: v. 沉湎，沉溺；纵容，迁就；满足（情感、兴趣、欲望等）；参加，参与（尤指违法活动）
wordGroup: indulge in vt. 沉湎于，沉溺于

sentences.en: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.cn: 她只是偶尔才会喝上杯葡萄酒。

sentences.en: They went into town to indulge in some serious shopping.
The inheritance enabled him to indulge his passion for art.
sentences.cn: 这笔遗产使他能够尽情投入他热爱的艺术。
